author: Techlore
description:
Wessel Klein Snakenborg, founder of NovaCustom, joins me to discuss building privacy-focused laptops with CoreBoot firmware, Intel Management Engine disabling, and full Linux compatibility. We dive deep into their custom hardware approach, Qubes OS certification, supply chain security, and why they chose to compete directly with Big Tech on hardware quality while maintaining complete user control. Techlore empowers individuals with practical digital privacy knowledge, security tools, and advocacy resources. Discover how to protect your online data and regain control of your digital identity.

📱 RESOURCES IN VIDEO:
• https://novacustom.com/
• https://doc.qubes-os.org/en/latest/index.html

🔎 RELATED VIDEOS:
• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NlEi0O8pPWo
• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zns0xObbOPM
• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=idSBvjaaFSk

📺 RELATED CHANNELS:
• Surveillance Report: https://www.youtube.com/@surveillancereport
• Techlore Clips: https://www.youtube.com/@techloreclips
•
title: From Coreboot to Qubes: Secure Hardware Deep Dive with NovaCustom

author: Techlore
description:
One user is implementing a backup strategy for their 2FA codes, and is using a fun trick to make Linux more secure! Welcome to Techlore's privacy wins of the week, where our community shares their tech wins. It can be privacy, security, or anything else tech-related! Join next week's stream in the pinned post on our forum: https://discuss.techlore.tech/
